private static boolean isPalindrome(final int start, final int end, final String s) {
    for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
        if (start + i >= end - i) {
            return true;
        }
        if (s.charAt(start + i) != s.charAt(end - i)) {
            return false;
        }
    }
}

private static boolean[] init(final int length, final String a, final String b) {// é…åˆ—ã®åˆæœŸåŒ–
    final boolean[] array = new boolean[length]; // lengthã¯ååˆ†å¤§ãã„å€¤
    Arrays.fill(array, true);
    for (int i = 0; i < a.length(); i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < b.length() && i + j < a.length(); j++) {
            // æ–‡å­—åˆ—aã®ä½ç½®iä»¥é™ãŒbã¨è¢«ã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ã®ç¢ºèª
            if (!match(a.charAt(i + j), b.charAt(j))) { 
                array[i] = false;
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return array;
}
private static boolean match(final char a, final char b) {
    return a == '?' || b == '?' || a == b;
}

// edges ã¯ Edge(int label1, int label2, long cost) ã®ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆ
edges.sort(Comparator.comparingLong(o -> o.cost));
final UnionFindTree unionFindTree = new UnionFindTree(n); // è¦ç´ æ•°nã®Union-Find Treeã‚’æ§‹ç¯‰
long sum = 0;
for (final Edge edge : edges) {
    if (!unionFindTree.isSame(edge.label1, edge.label2)) {

    }
}

public static void main(final String[] args) {
    final int[][] graph = new int[n][n];
    // åˆã‚ã«ç„¡é™å¤§ã®å€¤ã§å„è¦ç´ ã‚’åˆæœŸåŒ–
    for (int i = 0; i < graph.length; i++) {
        Arrays.fill(graph[i], Integer.MAX_VALUE / 2); // Integer.MAX_VALUEã§ãªã„ã“ã¨ã«æ³¨æ„
        graph[i][i] = 0;
    }

    // ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ•ã®å„è¾ºã‚’ä¸ãˆã‚‰ã‚ŒãŸå€¤ã«å¤‰æ›´

    // ã“ã“ã‹ã‚‰ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ãƒ«ãƒ•ãƒ­ã‚¤ãƒ‰
    for (int k = 0; k < graph.length; k++) { // ä¸­ç¶™ã™ã‚‹ç‚¹
        for (int i = 0; i < graph.length; i++) { // å‡ºç™ºã™ã‚‹ç‚¹
            for (int j = 0; j < graph.length; j++) { // åˆ°ç€ã™ã‚‹ç‚¹
                graph[i][j] = Math.min(graph[i][j], graph[i][k] + graph[k][j]); // ä¸­ç¶™ã™ã‚‹ç‚¹ã‚’ã¨ã£ãŸæ–¹ãŒçŸ­ã¨ãªã‚‹ã‹åˆ¤å®š
            }

    }
}
